mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO quest ( quest_title, quest_start, quest_end, quest_content, quest_desc, quest_to ) VALUES ( #{questTitle}, #{questStart}, #{questEnd}, #{questContent}, #{questDesc}, #{questTo} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
